Package main

Interface Summary
BoardInterface How the GUI and players can interact with the model of the board turn(), isOver(), and winner() are used by the game engine isTokenAt(), getOpenSpots(), and getTokenLocations() can be used by players
 

Class Summary
Applet Main entry point for an applet form.
Board A Board object keeps an underlying model of what's really going
CustomGameDialog Dialog for starting a new game with custom settings
GameEngine Drives the game via events, which call playRound()
GridPanel Physical representation of the board, full of BoardButtons
Main Main entry point for the application
MainWindow Acts as the main hub for the game.
SingleSettingDialog Dialog for changing a single setting and then starting a new game.
Turn Captures the notion of a move, noting its location and status
